ygData.subject: Re: question
ygData.msgSnippet: hmmmmmm. Sounds like great stuff. But i have another question, do fighting techniques differ for different occupations? I was thinking about being a Rogue
ygData.messageBody:
hmmmmmm. Sounds like great stuff. But i have
another question, do fighting techniques differ for
different occupations? I was thinking about being a Rogue
cause they sound cool- but if i fight w/ 'em would i
get to sneak up behind my enemies and like slit their
throats? Or would i just be faster at like hand to hand
combat? or both? I was thinking it'd be something like
Tenchu (assuming you've heard of that game). Also, is
there jumping in it? I'd imagine not, as there isnt in
many RPGs.
